title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally with a single command.

title: langchain-ai/langchain (Ollama integration)
summary: First-class LangChain LLM & Chat integration for Ollama, enabling retrieval-augmented generation and agent workflows with local models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for Ollama’s REST API, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip install ollama gives synchronous & async APIs, chat, embed, pull, list, etc.

title: ollama-webui (now Open WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted web interface for Ollama with chat history, model management, RAG, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama providing sync/async APIs, streaming, and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama; gem install ollama-ai gives idiomatic Ruby access to the REST API.

title: ollama-cli (Node)
summary: Experimental Node wrapper that exposes ollama commands as a programmable CLI toolkit.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as a GitHub-Copilot-like assistant.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-affinity and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image (ollama/ollama) with CUDA & ROCm variants for headless server deployments.

title: ollama-chat (React)
summary: Minimal React chat app that streams responses from Ollama over the REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET community library that wraps Ollama endpoints in strongly-typed C# with async enumerables for streaming.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain to chat with your documents offline.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into any channel; configurable model, system prompt, and rate limits.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server that listens for @ mentions and answers via Ollama with thread support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin that adds a local AI assistant pane powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Pure Nim client for Ollama with async HTTP, streaming, and native JSON marshalling.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Early-stage Rust crate providing typed REST bindings and Tokio-based streaming for Ollama.
